activation.condition: Spend 1 Resolve point (Divination spell); Optionally, use a Paradox

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.MDgUy3mrWNR7l77y]{Seer Anchor}

Your ability to foretell the future has improved, enabling you to direct and better focus your divinations. You gain insight into a specific event, goal, or activity. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.APgLb0BS0VgtE06l]{Divination}; when you do, you can choose to use a paradox in addition to expending the 1 Resolve Point required to cast the spell. If you do, you increase the chance to receive a correct divination by a number equal to the paradox used.
